Parameters: int: Contains the resulting status of the copy request. This will either be @B_android#view#PixelCopy#SUCCESS_E@ or one of the PixelCopy.ERROR_* values. Value is @B_android#view#PixelCopy#SUCCESS_E@, @B_android#view#PixelCopy#ERROR_UNKNOWN_E@, @B_android#view#PixelCopy#ERROR_TIMEOUT_E@, @B_android#view#PixelCopy#ERROR_SOURCE_NO_DATA_E@, @B_android#view#PixelCopy#ERROR_SOURCE_INVALID_E@, or @B_android#view#PixelCopy#ERROR_DESTINATION_INVALID_E@
onPixelCopyFinished(int).Description: Callback for when a pixel copy request has completed. This will be called regardless of whether the copy succeeded or failed.

ClassDesc: Listener for observing the completion of a PixelCopy request.
